title: Polemic and History
cleaned_text: Polemic and History A number of critics of Anthroposophy have acknowledged that they are writing polemical history when they attack Rudolf Steiner. Some even seem puzzled as to why that is considered a 'bad' thing. And certainly, from one point of view there is nothing 'bad' about polemic; it is what it is, after all.
